sentences.sContent: You’ll have to have that tooth extracted.
Oils are extracted from the plants.
sentences.sCn: 从这些植物中提炼出油。

sentences.sContent: I’ve only seen short extracts from the film.
sentences.sCn: 我只是看过那部电影的一些小片段。

sentences.sContent: ...one such popular me dicinal drink was vin ma a french product consisting of coca extract mixed with red wine...
...it still relies on traditional kola nut extract...
...but will also be in the ability to run real time data analytics to extract actionable and ongoing knowledge...

exam.question: Scientists are pushing known technologies to their limits in an attempt to ______ more energy from the earth.

answer.explain: extract from： 从…中提取…。句意： 科学家正努力将已知的技术用到极致， 试图采掘地球上更多的能源。inject： 注射， 注入； discharge： 解雇； 流出； drain： 消耗； 排水。

exam.question: It is one thing to locate oil, but it is quite another to ______ and transport it to the industrial centers.

answer.explain: 句意： 找到石油是一回事， 将其提炼并运送到工业中心却完全是另一回事。permeate： 透过； distinguish： 辨别； concentrate： 聚集。
